item.description:
Inspired by c25k.com (couch to 5k) I'm working my way up to a 5k run.  I'm not a runner, and I know nothing about running.  I've run once this year (2 miles at a sub 9-minute pace).  So, yes, I'm a beginner.

 

But I've got to start somewhere!  If you'd like to join me and work up to a 5K (3 mile run) this summer, join me at Gaudet School as we take advantage of their wonderful track.

 

IMPORTANT: The address used by meetup isn't quite right.  It will take you to the front of the school.  The track is at the BACK of the school (it's off Whyatt Road).  Here's a map.  The track is the blue thing: http://maps.google.com/maps?f=q&source=s_q&hl=en&geocode=&q=gaudet+middleschool&aq=&sll=37.0625,-95.677068&sspn=45.467317,45.263672&ie=UTF8&hq=gaudet+middleschool&...
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the guy with really short hair standing near the track entrance (behind the tennis court)
item.name: Slowly Working up to a 5K (3 mile) Run
